Package com.rabbitmq.client

Interface RecoverableChannel

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Channel, Recoverable, ShutdownNotifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
AutorecoveringChannel
public interface RecoverableChannel extends Recoverable, Channel
Convenient interface when working against auto-recovery channels.
Since:
4.0.0
